name: Suspicious Curl File Upload
description: Detects a suspicious curl process start the adds a file to a web request
false_positives: Scripts created by developers and admins
query: ((process.executable:/.*\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR process.pe.product:/[Tt][Hh][Ee]\ [Cc][Uu][Rr][Ll]\ [Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu][Tt][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee]/) AND process.command_line:(/.*\ \-[Ff]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-\-[Ff][Oo][Rr][Mm]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Tt]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-\-[Uu][Pp][Ll][Oo][Aa][Dd]\-[Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-[Dd]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \-\-[Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\ .*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\curl.exe OR process.pe.product:The\ curl\ executable) AND process.command_line:(*\ \-F\ * OR *\ \-\-form\ * OR *\ \-T\ * OR *\ \-\-upload\-file\ * OR *\ \-d\ * OR *\ \-\-data\ *))`
